summary: Feature request to expose `originalExecutionRunId` in `workflowInfo()` to enable deterministic PRNG seeding that remains stable through Resets but changes on Continue-As-New/Cron operations.
userImpact: Users cannot currently seed PRNGs deterministically in workflows with a value that changes on Continue-As-New/Cron but persists through Resets.
workaround: Math.random() is already deterministic and seeded using originalRunId, updated when run ID changes
keyQuote: Can we get this `originalExecutionRunId` exposed in `workflowInfo()`?
